title: Bug 134445[linux] scroll bars are required in Hyperlink Options
description: Bug 134445[linux] scroll bars are required in Hyperlink Options it seemed that it's limited by the size of the screen.
SR: steps to reproduce: create a report insert a label edit its hyperlink select Drillthrough notice the dialog boxexpected behavior: the user is able to choose all optionsactual behavior: the user could only format the target report in HTML as PDF option was inivisible.
